S. Korean Defects to North by Ship
    Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Hwang Hong Ryon, a south Korean, defected to the north by ship at around 16:30 on Wednesday. Hwang had to go through a hail of bullets and shells fired by the south Korean army when the ship was crossing the extension of the Military Demarcation Line in the East Sea of Korea.
 Hwang is now under investigation by a competent institution.

articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il
   l; Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received gifts from a delegation of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal led by Chairman Subash Kaji Shrestha, a delegation of the Association for the Study of the DPRK in Russia, a delegation of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association, a Polish delegation for the study of the Juche idea, Secretary General of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan Javed Ahmed Ansari who is heading its delegation and Chief of the Group for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il in Denmark Mogens Jensen, who are staying here to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
 The gifts were handed over to an official concerned.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Indonesians
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Megawati
   l; Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with former Indonesian President Megawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, and her party who are staying here to attend the commemorations of the 40th anniversary of Kimilsungia, flower of the sun, and the 7th Kimilsungia Festival, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
 Present there were Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairman of the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Association, and Hendrati Sukendar Munthe, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK.    l;
 Kim Yong Nam hosted a luncheon for Megawati Soekarnoputri and her party Thursday.
